import React from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import "../pages/style/About.css"; const About = () => { return (

About Our Recipe Sharing Platform

Welcome to our Recipe Sharing Platform, a community-driven hub for food lovers!

Our mission is to bring people together through the love of cooking. Whether you are an aspiring home chef, a seasoned cook, or just someone looking for delicious meal ideas, this platform is designed for you.

Why Choose Us?

  • Easy to Use: Share and discover recipes with a simple interface.
  • Community Driven: Save your favorite recipes and interact with others.
  • Image Uploads: Add appetizing images to showcase your culinary creations.
  • Search & Filter: Quickly find recipes based on ingredients or dish names.

Join us and be part of an ever-growing community of food lovers who share their passion through amazing recipes. Let's make cooking more fun and inspiring together!

Explore Recipes
); }; export default About;
